widget.name: BartNapApp
widget.description:
For people who want to take a nap on BART. It alerts a BART rider when their train is about to arrive at destination station. Enter station you just got on and enter station you're heading to. An alarm wakes you via sound and/or vibration.
NOTE: Must leave application running foreground.
How - Reads a local GTFS schedule to figure out when the train will arrive. Using phonegap and JQuery mobile frameworks.
widget.author: MTS Consulting
